mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBER VALUES( #{id}, #{password}, #{name}, #{nickname}, #{phone}, #{email}, SYSDATE,0, 'N', 'N', NULL, 'N', NULL,'N', #{snsjoin} )

select.if: SELECT * FROM MEMBER WHERE ID=#{id} AND PASSWORD=#{password} AND DELFLAG='N'
SELECT * FROM MEMBER WHERE ID=#{id} AND DELFLAG='N' AND SNSJOIN='Y'

mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MEMBER WHERE ID=#{id}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MEMBER WHERE NICKNAME=#{nickname}
mapper.update: UPDATE MEMBER SET DELFLAG='Y' WHERE ID=#{id}
UPDATE MEMBER SET NAME=#{name}, NICKNAME=#{nickname}, PHONE=#{phone}, EMAIL=#{email} WHERE ID=#{id}
UPDATE MEMBER SET PANALTY='Y', PANALTY_END_DATE=#{panalty_end_date} WHERE ID=#{id}
UPDATE MEMBER SET PANALTY='N', PANALTY_END_DATE='' WHERE ID=#{id}
